headline: BridgeBio Pharma: Q1 Earnings Snapshot

headline: Protect AI deal to strengthen Palo Alto Networks’ position, says Jefferies
summary: Jefferies analyst Joseph Gallo reiterated a Buy rating and $215 price target on Palo Alto Networks (PANW) after the company announced a definitive agreement to acquire Protect AI. The firm expects the acquisition to strengthen the company’s position as the cyber platform of choice, solidifying its ability to secure the new attack surface created by AI, via both acquisition and launch of the new Prima AIRS solution.
